CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains activity to MOT . CHI walks over to toys on the floor and picks up the toy duck
CHI turns and watches INV leave
MOT stands near door and looks at CHI
MOT kneels on the floor in front of CHI
MOT's head is not in camera view
CHI looks at toy duck in his hand and then looks up at the apparatus the table
MOT refers to the noise that the toy makes
MOT looks around the room also
squeezes the toy then looks down to his feet and the book that he is standing on
< .1u-1u .> CHI steps off of the book then drops the duck and bends down to pick up book
MOT moves forward on her knees
CHI walks toward MOT holding the book
CHI looks at the open book
MOT flips the pages of the book and shows CHI a picture
CHI turns back toward MOT and looks at the toys on the floor
MOT looks at picture then reaches out and grabs CHI's arm to turn him around
CHI bends down to pick up jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT props book up against the little chair
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box by the head and drops to the floor then squats down in front of the jack+in+the+box
MOT watches CHI as he pushes the jack+in+the+box down
CHI tries to push the jack+in+the+box in several times unsuccessfully
MOT reaches over and pushes the jack+in+the+box lid down for CHI
CHI pushes the jack+in+the+box clown down while MOT closes the lid
MOT pushes lid down and attempts to keep it shut
CHI removes hand from the jack+in+the+box so as not to get his hand shut in the lid
CHI looks closely at the jack+in+the+box
MOT holds down the lid of the jack+in+the+box and gets it to stay shut . MOT removes her hand from the lid
CHI sits back and reaches out for the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves jack+in+the+box closer to herself and begins to turn the handle
MOT knocks over the book that was propped against the chair
CHI sits back and watches the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI reaches forward toward the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box closer to CHI
MOT continues to turn the handle
CHI tries to open the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn the handle as jack+in+the+box gets ready to pop
MOT sits back and smiles at CHI
CHI reaches out for the jack+in+the+box and picks it up by its head
CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box and drops it on its side
picks up the jack+in+the+box and tries to push the clown in
<aft> MOT reaches over and pushes the clown in and pushes the lid down
CHI touches the handle then the lid and then reaches for the handle again
MOT tries to keep the lid down
CHI tries to grab the handle in order to turn it
MOT removes hand from lid then sits back
CHI sits back and looks at the jack+in+the+box
CHI has had his back to the camera throughout the entire jack+in+the+box sequence
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI pushes jack+in+the+box back in again
<aft> MOT tries several times to get the lid to stay closed
CHI sits back from the jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to try to keep the lid down and finally gives up
the jack+in+the+box pops up and stays up
CHI reaches to the side of the jack+in+the+box and picks up the toy car and the football and brings them both toward himself
<$=1> MOT points at the football then picks it up and shows it to CHI
CHI watches MOT pick up the football and looks at it
CHI stands up straddle then pushes the car between his legs then gets up and walks toward the electrical sockets in the corner of the room
<$=1> watches CHI walk to the corner of the room then reaches out to grab his arm restraining him
MOT pulls CHI away from the wall
CHI stands in front of the sockets with his back to the camera
CHI stares at the sockets and does not look at MOT who is restraining him
MOT looks at CHI as she speaks to him
CHI does not move from his stance in front of the sockets
MOT reaches over to pick up CHI and move him away from the sockets
CHI holds arm out toward sockets as MOT takes him away from the corner of the room
MOT picks up the book and still holds CHI by the arm
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box out of CHI's way
CHI watches the jack+in+the+box as MOT moves it
MOT points to a picture in the book
CHI bends down and grabs the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at the picture briefly then back at the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts the book down and reaches over to the jack+in+the+box
MOT shuts the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls hand away and looks closely at the jack+in+the+box
CHI squats back down and tries to turn the handle

MOT holds the lid down with her hand
CHI holds corner of the jack+in+the+box and looks at jack+in+the+box closely
CHI grabs the jack+in+the+box by the head
MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI pushes clown in the box and then lets go
MOT reaches out and touches the jack+in+the+box head with her fingertip and pushes it down . MOT pulls her hand away from jack+in+the+box .

INV enters the room and then leaves while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters the room at 14:28:40 and explains the forbidden object task to MOT .
INV clears the toys from Small Scale Activity and has MOT sit next to CHI at the table . CHI holds onto a small box
INV brings out the forbidden object and sets it on the table
CHI looks at the forbidden object
CHI holds the box toy in his hand as he stares at the forbidden object
INV lets go of the object setting it into motion
<bef> MOT places her hand on CHI in a restraint gesture
MOT leans forward and looks into CHI face then looks up at the object
CHI stares blankly at the object
CHI continues staring at the object while still holding the other toy
CHI reaches up to the Forbidden Object
<$=1> MOT leans over closely to CHI face
CHI stares at the forbidden object
CHI holds box-like toy in his hands through the next 12 turns

MOT holds CHI arm from touching the object
MOT makes circular motion with her hand
CHI reaches out to the object
MOT takes the box-like toy out of CHI hand
CHI reaches for the forbidden object with his other hand
MOT intercepts CHI reach for the object and holds CHI's arm lightly
CHI tries to free his hands to touch the forbidden object
INV takes the forbidden object off the table
explains the PCI interaction boxes to MOT . INV removes the toys from Small Scale Activity . MOT takes CHI out of the sassy seat

MOT puts ball to child's stomach and rubs it as if tickling him
MOT pulls back away from CHI

CHI walks straight ahead toward the desk
MOT intercepts CHI and stops him then rubs his stomach again with the ball as if tickling him
MOT turns CHI toward her and away from the desk
CHI walks toward the electric sockets in the corner of the room
MOT uses the special form in the previous line meaning "get you" to tease CHI
MOT again tickles CHI stomach with the ball
CHI walks toward the sockets and points at them
MOT pulls CHI to face her
this special form is used in the same context explained above
MOT voice gets higher as she repeats the special form phrase over and over again until the phrase becomes unintelligible
MOT runs the ball from CHI toes to his nose tickling him

<aft> CHI turns and walks to the sockets again
